Will invalidate the existing user/channe: This is for testing only. Do not ship with this set to true unless you understand what you are doing
Set this to false if you want MceApplica: true for automatic init, false for first init on firstInit call
Will automatically reinitialize sdk afte: true for auto reinitialize, false for manual reinitialize
Set groupNotificationsByAttribution to t: This will work on Android N and above
Please note, the log iteration files wil: <application cache folder on sdcard>/mce-react-native-sdk/logs/<installation time folder, format: yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss>
The number of log iteration files: After reaching this number, the log files will be overwritten in order
The number of log lines that will be sto: The higher this number is, more log lines will be lost in case of a crash.
Set useFileImageCache to true to use fil: Uses the sdcard application cache folder
